definition: trouble/disturbance/rumpus/flirty/coquettish/abbr. for 離騷|离骚[Li2 Sao1]/literary writings/smell of urine/foul smell/male (animal) (dialect)

sentences.english: Mount Tai has long been the preferred gathering place for artists and poets.
sentences.chinese: 泰山历来是画家骚客所钟情的聚集地。

sentences.english: Mount Tai has long been the preferred gathering place of artists and poets.//
sentences.chinese: 泰山历来是画家骚客所钟情的聚集地。

sentences.english: Throughout history, the beautiful city of Hangzhou has attracted numerous literary tourists.
sentences.chinese: 从古至今，美丽的杭州引得无数文人骚客留恋忘返。

definition: to search for the right word (of poet)
distinguished and accomplished/outstanding/talented in letters and unconventional in lifestyle/romantic/dissolute/loose
romance/beautiful scenery/small or petty (of talk etc)
poetic occasion/elegant situation/in literature, the cue for a poem
see 清風明月|清风明月[qing1 feng1 ming2 yue4]
